title: President Rajapaksa lays the foundation stone for the Sanchi Buddhist University
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana / Chandana Perera) President Mahinda Rajapaksa laid the foundation stone for the construction of the International University of Buddhist and Indic Studies in the ancient Buddhist city of Sanchi in the presence of dignitaries from Bhutan, Myanmar, Thailand, Japan, Cambodia, Mongolia, Nepal and India….
